author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Interview Opp- Interior Design Trends - Hotel Show 2015Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Interview Opp- Interior Design Trends – Hotel Show 2015 Published on : Tuesday, September 22, 2015
DND Contemporary Furniture Studio, will be participating at the Hotel Show on 28-30th September to showcase bespoke furniture that illustrate modern art, contemporary furniture and timeless pieces.
With more than 70 highly qualified craftsmen ranging from masons to cabinet makers, DND will for the first time exhibit their timelines pieces, following a huge demand from the UAE market.
The UAE is one of the world’s top holiday destinations with forecasts which report that the country will reach 20 million visitors by 2020. With Expo 2020 fast approaching, Dubai is set to see a massive increase of 28,000 new hotel rooms by 2018, as stated in an exclusive new report by Jones Lang LaSalle.
Source: -Hotel Show
